Some news item

Herndon, VA – February 20, 2013 – Endgame, Inc., a leading venture-backed provider of battle-tested, real-time analytics solutions that meet the challenges of the US Government’s defense and intelligence organizations, today announced the appointment of Niloofar Razi Howe as its Chief Strategy Officer.
